b:if.script: // coloring $(".post-single-outer h1, .post-single-outer h2, .post-single-outer h3, .post-single-outer h4, .post-single-outer h5, .post-single-outer h6").addClass('blue-text') $(".post-labels a").removeClass('grey-text').removeClass('text-darken-2') $(".post-author.vcard, .post-comment-link, .post-single-outer .post-labels a, .post-timestamp").removeClass('grey-text').removeClass('text-darken-2') $(".post-single-outer .post-labels a").addClass('white-text')
